title: I have Jinx but I never bought her
body: So I was about to play a game on TB when suddenly I saw that i had Jinx in my roster. Checked my champions and the store to make sure that I actually bought her but I never did. Is there a possibility that I might get banned for this?

replies.body: Jinx F2P because of Viktor bug
And you're complaining about getting a 6300 champ for free because.........
It's Irelia's fault. Let's nerf her!
TasteTheirFear is right - since Viktor is disabled and he was on the free to play roster, we've replaced him with Jinx.
